metadata.title: Express Booking
metadata.description: Book your event venues and services quickly and efficiently with our streamlined express booking process.

hero.title: Express Booking
hero.subtitle: Book your event venues and services quickly and efficiently with our streamlined express booking process.

quickBooking.title: Quick Booking
quickBooking.description: Book venues and services in just a few clicks. Our streamlined process saves you time and effort.

preApproved.title: Pre-approved Suppliers
preApproved.description: Access our network of pre-approved, high-quality suppliers. All vetted to ensure excellent service.

transparent.title: Transparent Pricing
transparent.description: See all costs upfront with no hidden fees. Compare options easily to find the best value for your budget.

step1.title: Enter Your Requirements
step1.description: Tell us what you need - location, date, number of attendees, and any specific requirements for your event.

step2.title: Browse Available Options
step2.description: Instantly see available venues and services that match your criteria. Filter by price, capacity, amenities, and more.

step3.title: Select and Book
step3.description: Choose your preferred options and book instantly. Secure your venue and services with immediate confirmation.

step4.title: Manage Your Booking
step4.description: Access all your booking details in one place. Make changes, add services, or communicate with suppliers as needed.
